question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "For example, TLIO and LIDR extended RoNIN by integrating Stochastic Cloning Extended Kalman Filters SCEKF and Left Invariant Extended Kalman Filters LIEKF, respectively IMUNet , DeepILS , and DeepLite focused on lightweight network design CTIN , SBIPTVT , and iMOT introduced attention mechanisms to enhance temporal modeling RNINVIO, SCHNN, and SSHNN constructed multibranch hybrid networks combining CNNs, LSTMs, and attention modules"?
answer: D. Yang, H. Liu, X. Jin, J. Chen, C. Wang, X. Ding,
reference_entry: D. Yang, H. Liu, X. Jin, J. Chen, C. Wang, X. Ding, and K. Xu,
